website_summaries.verdict: Pricey, but with a variety of unique colors and patterns, little ones will be bouncing in standout style. Choose it for smaller kids if aesthetics are a priority.
pros: Stands out from the crowd with multiple kid-friendly prints and colors
Vinyl construction is strong and durable
Size is ideal for kids under the age of eight
Features an easy-grip handle and lightly textured bottom for improved stability
cons: Expensive and no size options for older/taller kids

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, but too small for just turned 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, but the 18" pink butterfly hopper size is a bit too small already for my just turned 6 y.o. 45" (3" 9") niece. Would buy a size larger if purchasing again. Has stood up well with daily (often multiple times a day) use since receiving it for Christmas two months ago. Update: She began asking for a larger hopper at around 6 1/2 yrs old and this one was passed down to her brother (average height) on his 4th birthday. It's slightly too large for him but he prefers this one over his smaller hopper. The hopper has held up well despite daily use for 11 months and is only used inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Cheery_Chickadee

customer_reviews.title: Inflatable hopper toy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 3 year olds. They had a smaller ball that they enjoyed a lot but grew too big for so got this one based on reviews and am not disappointed. The ball comes deflated with air pump adapter and sealing plug with an instruction leaflet included. Inflating is straight forward. Use the pump adapter if using car pump and inflate. I used air compressor and was done in 20 seconds. Once filled, you can seal it with the provided plug and press it till flush with surface. The inflated ball is sturdy and has been working well for the kids. Would recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Vipul

customer_reviews.title: Christmas HIT!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these for Christmas gifts. Three girls ranging in age from 3-5 yrs old, 30 - 60lbs. Was a little tall for the 3 yr old, we just let out a little air. Was perfect for my average height 4 yr old, and worked fine with a little extra air for the bigger 5 yr old. These were a HUGE hit at Christmas. The girls bounced around for hours everyday. Exercise when it's too cold to be outside. Other than needing a little air on occasion, we have had no issues. We've not used one outside yet, so I can't speak to the durability for that.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: 18" is bigger than you think! LOL
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my 36" little 3 year old is too small for this! I should have gone with the 15" instead of the 18" ball because he can't get on this one. Too big. It is high quality though, holds air and is brightly colored with rich looking monster graphics. He loves it but it disappoints him that he can't do anything with it yet. We bought a little horse hopper for him for now to play with. I'm sure eventually we'll get a lot of use out of our Hedstrom ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Swatosh

customer_reviews.title: So simple yet so fun
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing I’ve bought my child in a looooong time. She bounces from room to room basically all day keeping herself entertained and also getting in some physical activity. My daughter is 6 and small for her age. I don’t know How well it would work for a tall kiddo but it’s been perfect for mine. Gave me a bit of my sanity back since all this quarantine craziness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky?
customer_reviews.text: So, I took this out of the pkg when I arrived and set it on our high end wooden side table for a week or two before inflating it. Something in the material reacted with the finishing on the side table such that the varnish and stain was peeled off the side table and was transferred to the ball.... and it won’t come off. So, the ball is sticky... and it ruined my side table.
customer_reviews.author: 1review

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, 5 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This hopper looks exactly as pictured. I purchased it for my 5 year old daughter so she could have some inside physical activity since it is winter here with teens for the high. She enjoys it very much. The only issue we have had is that our daughter's "technique" gets awkward but that is not the hoppers fault. It is definitely a core and balance workout for my her. Our daughter is above average height and will be six soon. Her feet are on their tippy toes when she first sits on it (we have it at the recommended circumference) so it will still fit her for quite a while yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get what is described
customer_reviews.text: Items I received is NOT as listed and described. The Bottom of ball and the handle is not as pictured. The description of ball bottom and handle is the reason I bought this brand. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Very pleased little boy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old is very happy with this bouncy hopper. It took some practice but now he bounces all over- inside the house and outside in our gravel yard. The ball is made of thick plastic and was very easy to inflate using our air compressor and the included adapter. I’m glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch the fun!
customer_reviews.text: Omg biggest fan ever here! I bought this for the little four year old girl I nanny for for her birthday and she is IN love with it as I had hoped for! Which makes me super happy to see her having fun with! It’s a nice bouncy ball and so far no incidents (crossing fingers)!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Grands love it
customer_reviews.text: My grands love this bounce ball. Great exercise. It gets them off the electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: really cute!
customer_reviews.text: my toddler was too small to reach the floor, but he loved it. He plays kickball with it! The ball is thick and does not feel like it would pop fast. The colors are vibrant and bright. It doesn't come with a small pump like the other one I bought for my older son, You have to blow it with your mouth. Kind of exhausting.
customer_reviews.author: sheepadoodlemom

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughter she literally jumps on this thing full force and she’s 50+ pounds! Veryyy thick rubber....Easy to inflate I did it with a hand pump for an air mattress lol. Worked out great...her favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: MxM

customer_reviews.title: Covered in a weird lube type substance.
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, there was a greasy lube type substance all over this ball! So much so that the inside of the box was covered in it as well. Had my son not been so excited for this, I would have returned it! Instead, I washed it off multiple times and sanitized it before I blew it up. Still wondering what the heck it was.........
customer_reviews.author: DawnLau

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. This ball never held air. It was purchased as a Santa gift, and I had to re-inflate it 4 times in the 2 weeks prior to Christmas. I inflated it at midnight on Christmas eve, and by 7am Christmas morning it had lost air. Even if it did hold air, my 3 year old really had no interest in it. It was smaller than the ones she has previously used at play group. Luckily I was able to return it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: darkski2610

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it! My daughter is a very ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! My daughter is a very tall 2.5 y-o and it fits her perfectly. We use this outside and have not experienced any leaks or pops.

customer_reviews.title: Material is more like a beach ball.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to purchase for my 4 year old granddaughter so she could have fun like my daughter did when she was younger. It works but the material is more like a beach ball than a kick ball. Not sure how long it will last but for now she likes it. 🤷🏻‍♀️

product_meta.title: Ball Bounce and Sport TOYS Hopper, 18-Inch
feature_bullets: The 18 inch diameter hopper features a durable grip and grab handle and textured bottom for added safety.
Fun Hopper for indoor and outdoor hopping
18" Hopper ball promotes coordination, balance, and core development skills
Removable and reinflatable plug for easy inflation and stores
The Hedstrom Hopper ball is the original Hopper. Hedstrom has been making toys like the Hopper Ball since 1913! Quality Hop Balls come from Hedstrom.
Hedstrom Hopper Ball is one of the best toys for kids because it promotes coordination, balance, and exercise and it's FUN. It’s durable enough that kids can hop and bop inside or outside.
Hedstrom Hopper Balls are designed to last. The durable vinyl material means you’ll be able to hop almost anywhere and the hopper ball will stay inflated and bouncy.
The Hedstrom Hopper Ball ships deflated but easily inflates with any hand pump or electric pump. Easily deflates for storage or travel. Pump not included.
